commit message:
add '?' as an alternate for 'x' for the Polish layout, for compatibility with usual AltGr mappings.

See also issue 87, I'm working on support for mapping the Alt key to AltGr for text entry.

Thai: Keymap changes contributed by hmmbug

See issue 72.

Use modifier-after-character for Thai keymap instead of Latin dead key logic.

(Also changing this for Hebrew, though this doesn't currently have niqqud mapped.)

See issue 114.
